Why MERCURY NLP

MERCURY NLP is user-friendly: cut & paste data, apply a pipeline and filters, get real-time analytical results. Spend only as much as you need to process a job. Mercury NLP is pay-per-byte and half the price of our competitors. Your jobs are your business. Select privacy options and know your NLP job is secure and HIPAA compliant.
